title: Richbased
author: Richbased
content: Argentina star player Lionel messi have been given the ballon d'Or for the eight time in his football career, the highest any player could achieve so far. Messi's performance over the years have been overwhelming and for the fact that he won the world cup even added in giving him huge credit in his football career. He has been resilience, committed and consistent over the years and I must say that this 8 ballon d'Or is deserving for Lionel Messi. What are your thoughts and views concerning messi winning this year's ballon d'Or is he worth it or not?
